name: copy(strokingWithWidth:lineCap:lineJoin:miterLimit:transform:)
desc: Returns a new path equivalent to the results of drawing the path with a solid stroke.
declaration: func copy(strokingWithWidth lineWidth: CGFloat, lineCap: CGLineCap, lineJoin: CGLineJoin, miterLimit: CGFloat, transform: CGAffineTransform = .identity) -> CGPath
